headline: A Look At M&T Bank (MTB) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Why M&T Bank is on investors’ radar today M&T Bank (MTB) shares closed at $222.12 after recent trading that included a 4.5% decline over the past week and a 2.9% decline over the past day, drawing fresh attention from bank investors. See our latest analysis for M&T Bank. While M&T Bank’s 1-day share price return of 4.47% and 7-day share price return of 2.88% have cooled near term momentum, its 90-day share price return of 15.94% and 1-year total shareholder return of 18.64% point to a...
